group.label: Order status
group.comment: Define all different statuses for your shoppers’ orders. This provides better understanding of the order’s progress and ensure a smooth experience.

field.label: Order creation
field.tooltip: Status of orders that have been created before the payment result is confirmed with a webhook from Adyen.

field.label: Payment authorisation
field.tooltip: Status of orders for which an AUTHORISATION webhook from Adyen confirmed that the payment amount has been authorized. Note: an authorisation status via the result URL does not trigger this status.

field.label: Payment capture for virtual products
field.tooltip: (optional) Select only status assigned to state complete. Leave empty to use the same as normal products

field.label: Pending bank transfer/SEPA orders
field.tooltip: By default, Adyen does not inform your Magento store about pending payments. If you want these webhooks to be received, Go to Adyen Customer Area => Server Communication and add BankTransfer Pending Webhook and Direct-Debit Pending Webhook.

field.label: Payment confirmed
field.tooltip: Status given to orders after capture result is confirmed by an AUTHORISATION webhook (if capture mode = immediate) or a CAPTURE webhook (if capture mode = manual capture) from Adyen.

field.label: Order cancellation
field.tooltip: Status given to orders after order cancellation is confirmed by a CANCEL_OR_REFUND webhook from Adyen. If orders are already invoiced, they cannot be cancelled, but will be refunded instead.

field.label: Send order confirmation email for Bank Transfer/SEPA
field.tooltip: Send a confirmation mail after Bank Tranfer/SEPA is placed (not yet paid). If you want these webhooks to be received, Go to Adyen Customer Area => Server Communication and add BankTransfer Pending Webhook and Direct-Debit Pending Webhook.
